heading: Today
text: Sun, mixing with clouds east of the Green Mountains.  Partly sunny west, becoming mostly cloudy, with a few afternoon snow showers in NY.  Milder.  Highs in the 20s, close to 30 in the warmer valleys south.  Winds light, becoming southwest up to 10 mph from the Champlain Valley west.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, with scattered snow showers.  Partly cloudy south.  Lows zero to 10 above south, 5 to 15 north.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy north outside the Champlain Valley, with localized snow showers.  Partly sunny in the Champlain Valley and south.  Highs in the 20s.  Light winds, becoming west to northwest near 10 mph.
